text: Consider the following function: void swap (int x, mt y) { inttemp=(x/y)*y+(x%y); x=(y/X)*x+(y%x); y = temp; } int main) { intx,y; X=_ y=_â€” swap (x, y); } Assuming call by reference parameter passing technique is used.
